cause.description:
It is imperative for man to understand who he is through the eyes of his creator, so through our lifestyles we will continue to represent Christ to the culutre letting our actons shine as a living breathing epistle to the world. Only through relationship with the creator can mankind know who he truly is. Not ceasing to end there but informing man on the difference of Agape and Eros love, eros love predicated on a cornerstone of Western Idealogy, but Agape founded as a key point in Christcentrism.
1. Teach Mankind who he is through the eyes of Christ
2. Equiping others to teach what they have learned
3. Producing a life founded on actions and servanthood
cause.name: Representing Christ to the Culture
